name: Materialize
description:
A dangerous new technology enables you to temporarily turn into a swarm of nanobots to navigate a hostile world full of armed guards and twisted researchers. In control of the swarm you can sneak past your deadly captors or defend yourself by entering their bodies with.. somewhat permanent effects.

Rematerialization may be horrifying but after these monsters have abducted and slaughtered scores of involuntary test subjects including your own family they must be stopped at all costs. Beware though, the swarm-core is rumoured to have driven its inventor to madness and every use seems to have a corrupting effect on the human body.

Controls
Toggle swarm mode: E
Rematerialize inside of enemy: Left click
